titleStmt.title: The copies of severall letters contrary to the opinion of the present powers, presented to the Lord Gen. Fairfax, and Lieut. Gen. Cromwell. By Francis White, Maior of his Excellencies regiment of foot.
titleStmt.author: White, Francis, d. 1657.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Paine for Tho. Slater, and Stephen Bowtell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
